titles.title: Make a joyful noise unto the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Make a joyful noise unto the Lord
All ye lands, all ye lands;
Make a joyful noise unto the Lord
All ye lands, all ye lands.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come before Him with singing,
Come before Him with joy.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Make a joyful noise unto the Lord
All ye lands, all ye lands!
